name: RESIDENT EVIL.NET
description:
Resident Evil.Net is a completely free online service that connects with compatible titles in the Resident Evil series.

The Resident Evil.Net app enables quick and easy access to the site's features wherever you are.

- Resident Evil.Net supports the following titles:
Resident Evil 6
Resident Evil Revelations
Resident Evil
Resident Evil Revelations 2
Umbrella Corps
RESIDENT EVIL 7 biohazard

With Resident Evil.Net, you can:
- Check your game stats and those of your friends.
- Receive push notifications from the game, for instance when your friends beat your high score (Resident Evil 6 only).
- Participate in exclusive online events with other players around the world.
- Earn rewards by participating in events and completing exclusive Resident Evil.Net achievements.
- Other features include browsing in-game files, plot summaries, and much more!
(Some features are limited to specific titles.)
